ygData.subject: Re: Dueling Tip
ygData.msgSnippet: Aue, I ave noticed this as well..I have it memorized to use that lst bit of mana in an emergency..it seems to not be resisted(im in Unrest right now) as much
ygData.messageBody:
Aue, I ave noticed this as well..I have it memorized to use that lst bit of
mana in an emergency..it seems to not be resisted(im in Unrest right now) as
much as anything else andis fast and mana efficient and is doing about 80
something per cast...combine that with Stun and Shockforce we take them down
nicely..

Next time you are in a group try this combination..in order:
Stun
Root
Cast force
(pause to watch the bad guys health go down)
and by that time the critter is usually down for te count or close to it
then cast Burst of fire or Shock of Lightning to finish it off..I usualy
have about 70% mana left over using this technique

Now lets talk about specialization
what do you people have in specialization that you are being resisted all
the time?
I have alteration as my primary and Evocation as my secondary..
I'm in unrest and rarely do the Yellow creatures resist root and Direct
damage spells.

As to the fact that noone likes wizards because of kill stealing..well..I
worked hard to get a name for myself as a good person to have in a group and
usually do not have a problem finding one..the minute I call out looking for
a group I usually get 3 or 4 tells and I get to have my pick..whats going on
where you are? Perhaps you should Roleplay more? I roleplay all the time i
am on ;-)

~ Auraelle Dracul ~
~Priestess of Veeshan~
~ Follower of Tunare ~
~ Lords of Light ~

(E'ci)
----- Original Message -----
From: James Guintu <james@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 02, 1999 5:30 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Dueling Tip


> From: "James Guintu" <james@...>
>
> I was messing around with some friends (whom are all casting classes and
me
> as a wiz) tonight and discovered(from a tip) something very interesting...
> At higher levels everyone's DD spells take a while to cast... Our secret
> weapon is our level 12 DD spell shock of lightning. It is hardly ever
> resisted, casts extremely fast AND interrupts casting. You can chain cast
> this sucker so much faster than other casting classes it's sick. Unless
my
> buddies went to their lower level spells, I would interrupt them every
time.
> Hoping you others out there will share your tips as well.
>
> Euros Arcane
> Rallos Zek
>
>
>
